traits.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Day)
entries: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10 damage) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10 damage) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.
